ai-tika-vin05t15:1_0: ‘From the village of Vessabhū’ is a term for five kinds of plants and seeds.
ai-tika-vin05t15:1_1: Here are the five kinds of plants:
ai-tika-vin05t15:1_2: Plants propagated from roots, stems, cuttings, or joints;

ai-tika-vin05t15:1_5: Propagation from joints, bamboo workers, reeds, or whatever other plants there are that are produced from joints, that grow from joints—this is called “propagation from joints”.
